name: snubby
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A snubby nose is short and turns upwards at the end: Her little straight nose was not at all snubby. He has a delicately fair complexion and a tiny, somewhat snubby nose.
short: He carried a snubby machine gun over his shoulder. The car comes in two models - a cute and snubby three-door version, and a five-door version.
More examplesFewer examplesCallum's nose is very snubby and rounded on the end.With a snubby oyster knife, he popped the shell open.Her snubby features made her ideal for certain roles on stage.
